price: Jedhi: "Dhugumatti salaanni kiyya, ibaadaan kiyya, jireenyi kiyyaafi duuti kiyyas Rabbii Gooftaa aalama qofaafi.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul inna ṣalātī wanusukī wamaḥyāya wamamātī lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
